CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Count_RBO_In_Process_Line_Items__c > 0, Count_Presented_Line_Items__c = 0), Id, 'apex/APXTConga4__Conga_Composer?SolMgr=1&serverUrl=' + $Api.Partner_Server_URL_370 + '&Id=' + Id + '&QueryId=' + '[TrucksRBO]0Q_014UAC668108,[Quoteline2]0Q_012UAC355309,[TradeIn]0Q_007UAC713212,' + '&WordStripIfs=1&CSVisible=1&CSRecipient1=' + SBQQ__PrimaryContact__c + '&CSRole1=SIGNER&ContactId=' + SBQQ__PrimaryContact__c + '&DefaultPDF=1&CSRecipient2=' + Sales_Rep_s_Manager__r.Id + '&CSRoutingType=SERIAL&CSExpiration=' + TEXT(TODAY()+6) + 'T05:59:59.000Z' + '&CSRequestReminder=1&CSRole2=SIGNER&CSExpirationReminder=' + TEXT(TODAY()+3) +'T05:59:59.000Z' + '&TemplateId=' + Conga_RBO_Template_Id__c + '&DS0=0&DS4=1&TemplateGroup=NOTHING&OFN=RBO+for+' + Conga_Account_Name__c + '-' + Name + '&contentVisibility=SharedUsers&contentShareType=I&ContentWorkspaceId=0581R000001Hz6I&ContentCustomFieldName=Conga_Merge__c&ContentCustomFieldValue=RBO|' + Id + '&CSEmailSubject=Custom+Truck+One+Source+Retail+Buyers+Order+for+Signature&CSEmailMessage=Your+sales+rep+has+sent+you+this+contract+for+signature.+Equipment+is+not+reserved+without+your+signature.&csmultidocs=0')
CustomField.label: HasRBOInProcessLineItems
